sentences.en: A polyester shirt would be cheaper than a cotton one.
sentences.cn: 涤纶衬衫比棉衬衫便宜.

sentences.en: After much experimenting, he found a method of translating them accurately into a hardy polyester.
sentences.cn: 经过多番实验, 终于找到了一种确能把它们转换成结实的聚酯的方法.

sentences.en: Cheapness is one of the main attractions of polyester resins.
sentences.cn: 廉价是聚酯树脂受到欢迎的主要原因之一.

sentences.en: Cotton is more resistant to being squashed and polyester is more resilient.
sentences.cn: 棉布更抗压，而涤纶更有弹性。

sentences.en: He was wearing a burgundy polyester jacket.
sentences.cn: 他穿着一件紫红色的涤纶夹克。

sentences.en: Heel Pillows filled with comfortable polyester filling and covered in soft cotton.
sentences.cn: 内部充满了舒适的聚酯填充物和柔软的棉花.

sentences.en: Includes a matching pre - tied butterfly belt. 100 % polyester with lining.
sentences.cn: 包括匹配的预蝴蝶腰带系安全带. 100%聚酯纤维衬里.

sentences.en: man-made fibres such as nylon and polyester
sentences.cn: 尼龙和涤纶之类的人造纤维

sentences.en: Polyester fiber surface is super, tough enough to wear and long life.
sentences.cn: 表层是超强聚酯纤维, 强韧耐用,耐磨,使用寿命长.

sentences.en: The instrument is applied successfully to the measuring polyester fiber online.
sentences.cn: 该装置已经成功运行在涤纶短纤的在线检测中.

sentences.en: The polyester , polythylene adipate, was removed from the reactor.
sentences.cn: 将聚酯, 聚已酸乙稀酯从反应器中拿出来.

sentences.en: The technology conditions have effect on polyester shrinkage rate were discussed.
sentences.cn: 探讨了影响涤纶短纤维收缩率的工艺条件.

sentences.en: Thermo - bonded polyester battings are low energy consumption and no pollution.
sentences.cn: 涤纶热熔絮片具有能耗低、无污染的特点.

sentences.en: We supply polyester button, mental button, lace andand hangtag, hanger ect.
sentences.cn: 供应树脂钮扣, 金属钮扣, 花边织带,唛头,挂牌, 衣架及其他.

phrases.tran_cn: 聚酯多元醇；多元醇聚酯树脂

trans.tran_en: an artificial material used to make cloth
